author: Nathan Munn, Josh Visser
title: My Biggest Coronavirus Fear Is My Kid's Mental Health
description: As daycare and activities are shut down, my exuberant 4-year-old has become moody and anxious. And the crisis hasn't even really hit yet.
content:
This article originally appeared on VICE Canada.
Why is daycare closed, Dad?
My four-and-a-half year old daughter asked the question over breakfast, prompting a quick and silent consultation between my wife and I: How to respond, in how much detail? My wife… [+5341 chars]
